annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m taking a look at the Sherry Cobbler! The Sherry Cobbler is really a drink that may very well predate the Old Fashioned. ...
annotations.title: Sherry Cobbler | How to Drink

textContent:
A few orange slices
.5oz Gomme/Simple syrup
4oz Sherry

Shake violently and pour
Garnish with orange slices and mint and more (raspberries and blackberries)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bD1XoJnuBlk
title: Sherry Cobbler
